mapper.select: SELECT s.USER_ID, s.BUSINESS_NAME, s.BUSINESS_LI, s.VERIFIED, s.BUSINESS_NUMBER, s.ACCOUNT, s.BANKNAME, s.LAT, s.LNG, u.NAME AS USER_NAME, u.ADDRESS AS USER_ADDRESS FROM SELLER_INFO s JOIN USERS u ON s.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE s.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UDATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE USERS SET PHONE = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UDATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT O.ORDER_NO) FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_ITEM OI ON O.ORDER_NO = OI.ORDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON OI.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{sellerId} AND TRUNC(O.ORDERDATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT NVL(SUM(O.TOTAL_PRICE), 0) FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_ITEM OI ON O.ORDER_NO = OI.ORDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON OI.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{sellerId} AND TRUNC(O.ORDERDATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT NVL(AVG(R.RATING), 0.0) FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{sellerId}

SELECT O.ORDER_NO AS orderNo, P.PNAME AS productName, OI.QUANTITY AS quantity, NVL(OI.QUANTITY * OI.PRICE, 0) AS amount, O.STATUS AS status, TO_CHAR(O.ORDERDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDate FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_ITEM OI ON O.ORDER_NO = OI.ORDER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON OI.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{sellerId} ORDER BY O.ORDERDATE DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY
